title: Revolut Shakes Up Crypto Market: Delists Cardano, Polygon, and Solana in US
description: Following the SECs crackdown on a handful of altcoins, leading crypto exchange platforms like Revolut have begun to delist major crypto assets.  Henceforth, U.S. based Revolut users will no longer be able to purchase Cardano (ADA), Polygon (MATIC), and Solana (SOL) on the platform.  The cryptocurrency ecosystem is experiencing major pushback from different angles, following [...]
